tool.name: XFDR
tool.description: Calculates false discovery rate estimates on crosslink identifications
tool.command:
XFDR
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out_idXML: -out_idXML $param_out_idXML #end if #if $param_out_mzIdentML: -out_mzIdentML $param_out_mzIdentML #end if #if $param_minborder: -minborder $param_minborder #end if #if $param_maxborder: -maxborder $param_maxborder #end if #if $param_mindeltas: -mindeltas $param_mindeltas #end if #if $param_minionsmatched: -minionsmatched $param_minionsmatched #end if #if $param_uniquexl: -uniquexl #end if #if $param_no_qvalues: -no_qvalues #end if #if $param_minscore: -minscore $param_minscore #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #end if

param.name: param_in
param.label: Crosslink Identifications in either xquest.xml, idXML, or mzIdentML format (as produced by OpenPepXL)

param.name: param_minborder
param.label: Filter for minimum precursor mass error (ppm)
param.help: (-minborder) Can only be applied for xquest.xml input

param.name: param_maxborder
param.label: Filter for maximum precursor mass error (ppm)
param.help: (-maxborder) Can only be applied for xquest.xml input

param.name: param_mindeltas
param.label: Filter for delta score, 0 is no filte
param.help: (-mindeltas) Minimum delta score required, hits are rejected if larger or equal. Can only be applied for xquest.xml input

param.name: param_minionsmatched
param.label: Filter for minimum matched ions per peptide
param.help: (-minionsmatched) Can only be applied for xquest.xml input

param.name: param_uniquexl
param.label: Calculate statistics based on unique IDs
param.help: (-uniquexl) Can only be applied for xquest.xml input

param.name: param_no_qvalues
param.label: Do not transform simple FDR to q-values

param.name: param_minscore
param.label: Minimum score to be considered for FDR calculation

tool.help:
Calculates false discovery rate estimates on crosslink identifications
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/UTILS_XFDR.html
